data.title: Score Group plc: Revenue, Competitors, Alternatives
data.meta_description: Score Group plc top competitors are SPOC Automation, Diversified Gas and Oil Corporation and The McPherson Companies and they have annual revenue of $542.6M  and 1582  employees.
data.text:
Score Group plc is an international organisation providing clients with a worldwide around the clock range of engineering solutions in total valve management, gas turbine solutions, subsea technology, engineering design & consultancy, specialised acoustic monitoring / testing and specialised technical training.

Score Group's headquarters are based in Peterhead, Scotland, alongside locations worldwide across five continents. The Group primarily supports the oil & gas industry but also works with the nuclear, utilities, marine and naval markets.

To join our dedicated team and view our career opportunities visit www.score-group.com/careers

keywords:N/A
